title: Monotype Foundation Scholarship Event
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20070813163555/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 22.Mar.2006 11.00am 

=====

Monotype Foundation Scholarship Event  
Wednesday evening, April 5  
Reception 6:00 – Presentations 7:00

We invite you to join us for a special event announcing the first Monotype Foundation scholarship. The announcement will be preceded by a special lecture by Matthew Carter on the work of Bruce Rogers. A limited edition print of Bruce Rogers’ original drawings for Monotype Centaur will also be given away at the event. In addition, all attendees will receive, free, the Centaur typeface family as OpenType fonts.

Fee:  
TDC members $15  
Nonmembers $20
